EmailTemplate.name: MM Blast
EmailTemplate.subject: Meeting with Mike ACV Enviro. (Cycle Chem, Clean Venture, Allstate Power Vac)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hope all is well. I would like to make an appointment with you. I am interested in your chemical disposal and field service work. My name is Michael. I work for ACV enviro. We can offer great service and better pricing. Your location is in our back yard. ACV Enviro is a fully integrated environmental services and waste management organization with offices throughout the Northeast and Midwest. We manage permitted part B treatment, disposal and recycling facilities; supported by an extensive line of remediation, transportation, industrial cleaning, emergency response and field services.
Do you have time on Wed/Thursday of next week?
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
Our Website is www.acvenviro.com
Michae
Cantelmo
